name: Tea-riffic!
description:
Collect the teabags to earn points. Avoid the coffee beans, they will crack your cup.

Use arrow keys or A/D to control teacup.

My first ever game jam, made in 3 hours for Trijam #156! The theme was 'tea time'.

Sorry if your computer is really slow. Did not have time to implement delta time.

Credits:

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/pixel-emulator.font
